mapper.select: select * from ( select rownum, a.userid, a.empno, a.emppwd, a.ename, a.emptel, a.deptcode, a.teamcode, a.poscode, a.empapprove, a.deptname, a.posname, a.attdate, a.attstarttime, a.attendtime from ( select e.userid, e.empno, e.emppwd, e.ename, e.emptel, e.deptcode, e.teamcode, e.poscode, e.empapprove, d.deptname, p.posname, t.attdate, t.attstarttime, t.attendtime from emp e join dept d on e.deptcode = d.deptcode join position p on e.poscode = p.poscode join attendance t on e.userid = t.userid order by deptcode ) a where to_char (attdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = '${param1}-${param2}-${param3}' )
